user.title: Set up Tasmanian Transport
user.description:
Configure your bus stop for real-time departure tracking.

**About Stop IDs:**
Stop IDs consist of your postcode followed by three digits (e.g., 7109023 for postcode 7109).

**To find your stop ID:**
1. Visit the [Tasmanian Transport website]({transport_site_url})
2. Search for your bus stop
3. Copy the ID from the URL

**Example:** For stop 7109023, you'll see it in the URL like: .../#?stop=7109023
